description: List material type conversions with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admins can list all material type conversions. Non-admin users can list conversions where they are members of the conversion's broker or the conversion's material supplier.

flags.name: --material-supplier
flags.description: Filter by material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --material-site
flags.description: Filter by material site ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --material-type
flags.description: Filter by material type ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --foreign-material-supplier
flags.description: Filter by foreign material supplier ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --foreign-material-site
flags.description: Filter by foreign material site ID (comma-separated for multiple)

flags.name: --foreign-material-type
flags.description: Filter by foreign material type ID (comma-separated for multiple)
